## Description {#details}

A manager for alias analyses.

This class can have analyses registered with it and when run, it will run all of them and aggregate their results into single <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a> results interface that dispatches across all of the alias analysis results available.

Note that the order in which analyses are registered is very significant. That is the order in which the results will be aggregated and queried.

This manager effectively wraps the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysismanager">AnalysisManager</a> for registering alias analyses. When you register your alias analysis with this manager, it will ensure the analysis itself is registered with its <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysismanager">AnalysisManager</a>.

The result of this analysis is only invalidated if one of the particular aggregated <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a> results end up being invalidated. This removes the need to explicitly preserve the results of <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aamanager">AAManager</a></code>. Note that analyses should no longer be registered once the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aamanager">AAManager</a></code> is run.

Definition at line 933 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/aliasanalysis-h">AliasAnalysis.h</a>.
